subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: David Ngog sent Liverpool into the final 16 of the League Cup with a 1-0 victory at Leeds, and Arsenal was a 2-0 winner over West Bromwich Albion, which played with 10 men after Jerome Thomas was sent off in the 37th minute for slapping Jack Wilshere in the face after they tangled on the ground.
